list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a gesture, action, or sound that is used to convey information or instructions, typically by prearrangement between the parties concerned.
an electrical impulse or radio wave transmitted or received.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thiết bị nhận tín hiệu TV

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an apparatus on a railroad, typically a colored light or a semaphore, giving indications to train engineers of whether or not the line is clear.
transmit information or instructions by means of a gesture, action, or sound.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: hold your fire until I signal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giữ lửa của bạn cho đến khi tôi báo hiệu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: striking in extent, seriousness, or importance; outstanding.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their signal failure to achieve a satisfactory solution to the problem
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tín hiệu của họ không đạt được một giải pháp thỏa đáng cho vấn đề
